txt.en: Explore the southern waterfall
Explore the eastern waterfall
Bring the pottery to Drudwen
The waterfalls in and around the sleepy town of Clegur may hide secrets.
Sharp rocks seem to be all that's here
This skeleton looks too large to be a hobbit
The pounding waterfall will not allow you further
Rocks jut out behind the thundering waterfall
This skeleton looks too large to be a hobbit
'Could there be caves or secret Elven glens behind the falls? Anything could be back there!'

'Goodness, you are soaked! But you did not drown - good work! And what have you there?'

You hand over the broken vase.

'Well would you look at that! How old is this, I wonder? And you found a skeleton too? Oh, I cannot wait to tell all of my friends about the discoveries that I... er, that is, that we... have made! Thank you!'

'Hullo there. You look like the adventurous sort! Just the type of person I need. Have you noticed all the waterfalls around Clegur? I am endlessly curious about what might be behind them!\n\n'Unfortunately, I cannot swim. Can you swim? Maybe you could explore the falls for me and tell me what you find?'
A skeleton lies on the nearby rocks!
Behind the Falls
You found a piece of old pottery!
You should report back to Drudwen with the pottery and news of the skeleton you found behind the waterfalls.\n\nDrudwen is in the town of Clegur, in southern Swanfleet.
Explore the north-eastern waterfall
Drudwen has asked you to explore the waterfalls in and around Clegur.\n\nClegur is in the south-west of Swanfleet.
Explore the waterfall behind the bridge
Naught but rocks and pounding water
Explore the north-western waterfall
The rushing water will not allow you furthur
Explore the south-eastern waterfall
